We added content sync - a highly anticipated capability - and valuable improvements to other features, like usage tracking for web pages! But, of course that's not all, so dive in and learn about the updates we've just delivered in Xperience by Kentico.

sync","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"35c6f322-6e44-41db-8762-2677f3eda103"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"fac9df51-e343-4073-baa9-79e5d15e85fe","headingLevel":"7625c3c0-63ce-48de-ad05-ee557879c104","headingLevelsParsed":"ea93ac20-7c81-4276-afd5-a0a87ece89d3","showHeadingAnchor":"97b2e666-f8dc-4b50-b66a-9a3cba8cd276","headingAlignment":"1b71634f-d149-4a99-9351-c08ad8cef8c8","headingAlignmentsParsed":"4f165775-a785-439a-8c03-a1c1651444a8","id":"45a7aa2e-c0f2-4ed1-a993-5ce23631aa22"}}]},{"identifier":"9cd67a92-5759-49ad-9731-5fe3bb3b9880","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"5b5fa6db-6e5c-4001-bf2a-db4c3e61ef06","properties":{"markdown":"Let's get straight to the point. We asked for feedback on our roadmap and all of you gave it. You want a way to author content in a pre-production environment and then promote it to production when it's approved and ready to go live.

This is important for content governance, validating campaigns and content updates with stakeholders outside of the Xperience administration, and security requirements that limit access to production environments.

We've been hard at work designing a solution that is simple enough for marketers to use without technical assistance but robust enough to ensure content is quickly and securely transferred between environments while also maintaining its connections to other linked content items.

With our May 2025 Refresh, we're thrilled to announce [the initial phase of this capability](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/163-content-sync-xbyk-s-answer-to-content-staging-phase-1-content-items). We're calling it [content sync](https://docs.kentico.com/x/content_sync_xp).
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"67e5111e-2507-4183-be7f-95691248b3ee"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"37457735-9249-450b-8e4b-670295aa540e","markdownStyle":"1c58c44c-0649-4e04-b1af-ce0ab8736aba","markdownStyleParsed":"a65bdb09-96d0-45f0-9fdc-e7d234ff7426","markdownCodeLanguage":"eed3ccbc-f6a0-491a-8696-f37d595a3d33","id":"3980a119-deb8-4846-b892-cef66f14fa47"}}]},{"identifier":"fad7ff00-81aa-459a-a15d-5a425a15e0f0","type":"CommunityPortal.VideoWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"fcdb1938-f90e-44fc-ad45-9b32a67e3d27","properties":{"selectedVideos":[{"identifier":"31ac162b-2d60-4a08-b908-2f8002de04e4"}],"videoAlignment":"Center","videoAlignmentParsed":1,"size":"Large","sizeParsed":2,"showDescriptionAsCaption":true,"id":"018a63fa-3089-4c6f-b216-fc6c80246ad8"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"selectedVideos":"8353d65b-e65d-4d33-bde9-44be4e2d57f2","videoAlignment":"d0f1e64f-de88-4094-9fa7-889ee7972761","videoAlignmentParsed":"77bde65c-1203-46ca-8eea-3567c1c4d656","size":"334231d8-72b5-41ba-9852-a167c952da8c","sizeParsed":"9715a4cb-43f5-43b3-af39-6680cf4c6e9b","showDescriptionAsCaption":"5ba83d84-2a25-4701-b698-cdb4313c5655","id":"df091232-9dbd-407a-9c01-9e78c2c82e17"}}]}]}],"fieldIdentifiers":{"layout":"2d1cd85d-55b7-4ebc-971c-5c493e2747ce","layoutParsed":"3f02e6af-f2ea-40e3-b6dd-71dd459af829","paddingTop":"5d66d39b-81db-444a-be23-82f49dbb56f7","paddingTopParsed":"623f0432-8bb0-40b6-a56d-cd08f426516e","paddingBottom":"c7917a1c-0828-40a4-8eca-b370f75208dc","paddingBottomParsed":"a5e1555f-88a2-48c1-8c06-70bda89cb78f","backgroundColor":"6dd6d9db-3a71-4ee0-b8b2-e9a9e2e57f19","backgroundColorParsed":"e1801c66-eb2d-47fd-bf7b-d913d93e313f"}},{"identifier":"d404a7e5-0ea1-4ad2-94e3-5549a99e699e","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"2dad6290-015d-493e-8389-f7a28e3885f6","widgets":[{"identifier":"8422d911-4a5f-4bf3-b8f7-6cf0bac151bb","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"584782d0-16ba-47cb-ad04-64a0edcc4c2f","properties":{"headingText":"What's next?","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"299ec356-0534-409d-914a-9d2d847fb451"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"01cb51ae-689b-45f9-b563-09fd5d90e369","headingLevel":"5ea92e06-c065-4a8a-adad-a3e7c1236cf9","headingLevelsParsed":"e5d85837-814b-4f28-8465-b9d5cec57303","showHeadingAnchor":"e54ff62c-71fa-4b7e-8119-ec791aec0c74","headingAlignment":"332becff-c323-4930-9884-c99db26a7027","headingAlignmentsParsed":"90893b06-587b-4904-81df-abcaf2100c02","id":"62f6ba74-b1ed-4be0-9a8e-7b68f3ad9b48"}}]},{"identifier":"4712de43-8955-4b57-8c73-63335b5636ac","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2e17faef-b100-4c39-8f7a-befc9fc485e8","properties":{"markdown":"As always, check out [our documentation Changelog](https://docs.kentico.com/changelog#refresh-may-19-2025) for the full Refresh feature and technical details.

We hope these new capabilities, features, and API improvements unlock solutions for you. Try them out, [let us know](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes) 👋 what you think.

For [the next Refresh](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes)... wow, I don't even know where to start!

* [Support for multiple vanity URLs per web page](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/257-multiple-vanity-url-support), enabling more complex marketing campaigns and content migrations from other platforms.

* [Another iteration of digital commerce](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/303-digital-commerce-iteration-2-preview-), with order status management and notifications.

* [A conversational interface with AIRA](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/292-interact-seamlessly-with-aira-through-a-conversational-interface), seamlessly integrated into the Xperience administration UI to support marketers while they use Xperience.

These updates will, as always, accompany a number of UX and developer-focused improvements.

Check back next month for another Xperience by Kentico Refresh review!
